sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.IllegalArgumentException</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Provides exception wrapping for illegal arguments specified.</description> <name>IllegalArgumentException</name> <script><![CDATA[/** * Provides exception wrapping for illegal arguments specified. * @author Roy Laurie <roy.laurie@service-now.com> RAL */ var IllegalArgumentException = Class.create(); IllegalArgumentException.prototype = Object.extendsObject(GenericException);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2011-08-05 15:51:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>82c07f2d3710100034408c00dfbe5d87</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>IllegalArgumentException</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Core Automation" source="com.snc.core.automation">ee2289476d6620100acb70b3534330ff</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_82c07f2d3710100034408c00dfbe5d87</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2011-08-05 16:00:01</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>255</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
